verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> ye this word הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I נֹשֵׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> which I take up עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> you קִינָ֖ה <S%H7015><s%> against you [even] a lamentation בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

נָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> is fallen לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> she shall no more ק֔וּם <S%H6965><s%> rise בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> The virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִטְּשָׁ֥ה <S%H5203><s%> she is forsaken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתָ֖הּ <S%H127><s%> upon her land אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There מְקִימָֽהּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> [there is] none to raise her up

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> The city הַיֹּצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> that went out אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> [by] a thousand תַּשְׁאִ֣יר <S%H7604><s%> shall leave מֵאָ֑ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְהַיּוֹצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> and that which went forth מֵאָ֛ה <S%H3967><s%> [by] an hundred תַּשְׁאִ֥יר <S%H7604><s%> shall leave עֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> ten לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דִּרְשׁ֖וּנִי <S%H1875><s%> Seek וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> ye me and ye shall live

וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּדְרְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> But seek בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> not Bethel וְהַגִּלְגָּל֙ <S%H1537><s%> into Gilgal לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תָבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> nor enter וּבְאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H884><s%> not to Beersheba לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <S%H5674><s%> and pass כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הַגִּלְגָּל֙ <S%H1537><s%> for Gilgal גָּלֹ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> shall surely יִגְלֶ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> go into captivity וּבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> and Bethel יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will come לְאָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> shall come to nought

דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> Seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> and ye shall live פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or יִצְלַ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> lest he break out כָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> like fire בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וְאָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> and devour וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> none מְכַבֶּ֖ה <S%H3518><s%> [it] and [there be] none to quench לְבֵֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> [it] in Bethel

הַהֹפְכִ֥ים <S%H2015><s%> Ye who turn לְלַעֲנָ֖ה <S%H3939><s%> to wormwood מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness לָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth הִנִּֽיחוּ׃ <S%H3240><s%> and leave off

עֹשֵׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> [Seek him] that maketh כִימָ֜ה <S%H3598><s%> the seven stars וּכְסִ֗יל <S%H3685><s%> and Orion וְהֹפֵ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> and turneth לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> into the morning צַלְמָ֔וֶת <S%H6757><s%> the shadow of death וְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and maketh the day לַ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> with night הֶחְשִׁ֑יךְ <S%H2821><s%> dark הַקּוֹרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> that calleth לְמֵֽי־ <S%H4325><s%> for the waters הַיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכֵ֛ם <S%H8210><s%> and poureth them out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ס

הַמַּבְלִ֥יג <S%H1082><s%> That strengtheneth שֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> the spoiled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עָ֑ז <S%H5794><s%> against the strong וְשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> so that the spoiled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִבְצָ֥ר <S%H4013><s%> against the fortress יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> shall come

שָׂנְא֥וּ <S%H8130><s%> They hate בַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate מוֹכִ֑יחַ <S%H3198><s%> him that rebuketh וְדֹבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> him that speaketh תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> uprightly יְתָעֵֽבוּ׃ <S%H8581><s%> and they abhor

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Forasmuch בּוֹשַׁסְכֶ֞ם <S%H1318><s%> therefore as your treading עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on דָּ֗ל <S%H1800><s%> [is] upon the poor וּמַשְׂאַת־ <S%H4864><s%> from him burdens בַּר֙ <S%H1250><s%> of wheat תִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> and ye take מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at בָּתֵּ֥י <S%H1004><s%> houses גָזִ֛ית <S%H1496><s%> of hewn stone בְּנִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1129><s%> ye have built וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will not תֵ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> but ye shall not dwell בָ֑ם כַּרְמֵי־ <S%H3754><s%> vineyards חֶ֣מֶד <S%H2531><s%> pleasant נְטַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H5193><s%> in them ye have planted וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁתּ֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> but ye shall not drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֵינָֽם׃ <S%H3196><s%> wine

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> For I know רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> your manifold פִּשְׁעֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> transgressions וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> and your mighty חַטֹּֽאתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H2403><s%> sins צֹרְרֵ֤י <S%H6887><s%> they afflict צַדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> the just לֹ֣קְחֵי <S%H3947><s%> they take כֹ֔פֶר <S%H3724><s%> a bribe וְאֶבְיוֹנִ֖ים <S%H34><s%> the poor בַּשַּׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate הִטּֽוּ׃ <S%H5186><s%> and they turn aside

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הַמַּשְׂכִּ֛יל <S%H7919><s%> Therefore the prudent בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> in that time הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> such יִדֹּ֑ם <S%H1826><s%> shall keep silence כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> time רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> for it [is] an evil הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> such

דִּרְשׁוּ־ <S%H1875><s%> Seek ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> and not evil לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> that ye may live וִיהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become כֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> and thus יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> and so the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> the God צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you אֲמַרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H559><s%> shall be with you as ye have spoken

שִׂנְאוּ־ <S%H8130><s%> Hate רָע֙ <S%H7451><s%> the evil וְאֶ֣הֱבוּ <S%H157><s%> and love ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> the good וְהַצִּ֥יגוּ <S%H3322><s%> and establish בַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment אוּלַ֗י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יֶֽחֱנַ֛ן <S%H2603><s%> will be gracious יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> it may be that the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> unto the remnant יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph ס

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> the God צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> the Lord בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רְחֹב֣וֹת <S%H7339><s%> [shall be] in all streets מִסְפֵּ֔ד <S%H4553><s%> thus Wailing וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חוּצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in all the highways יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say הוֹ־ <S%H1930><s%> Alas ה֑וֹ <S%H1930><s%> alas וְקָרְא֤וּ <S%H7121><s%> and they shall call אִכָּר֙ <S%H406><s%> the husbandman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵ֔בֶל <S%H60><s%> to mourning וּמִסְפֵּ֖ד <S%H4553><s%> to wailing אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to י֥וֹדְעֵי <S%H3045><s%> and such as are skilful נֶֽהִי׃ <S%H5092><s%> of lamentation

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּרָמִ֖ים <S%H3754><s%> And in all vineyards מִסְפֵּ֑ד <S%H4553><s%> [shall be] wailing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אֶעֱבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> for I will pass בְּקִרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7130><s%> through אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הַמִּתְאַוִּ֖ים <S%H183><s%> unto you that desire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> to what end זֶּ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> purpose לָכֶ֛ם י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] it for you? the day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> you חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> [is] darkness וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> and not light

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> did flee אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> As if a man מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from הָאֲרִ֔י <S%H738><s%> a lion וּפְגָע֖וֹ <S%H6293><s%> met הַדֹּ֑ב <S%H1677><s%> and a bear וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> him or went הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house וְסָמַ֤ךְ <S%H5564><s%> and leaned יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> on the wall וּנְשָׁכ֖וֹ <S%H5391><s%> bit הַנָּחָֽשׁ׃ <S%H5175><s%> and a serpent

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> instead חֹ֛שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> [be] darkness י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [Shall] not the day יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> of light וְאָפֵ֖ל <S%H651><s%> gloom וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no נֹ֥גַֽהּ <S%H5051><s%> and no brightness לֽוֹ׃

שָׂנֵ֥אתִי <S%H8130><s%> I hate מָאַ֖סְתִּי <S%H3988><s%> I despise חַגֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H2282><s%> your feast days וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אָרִ֖יחַ <S%H7306><s%> and I will not smell בְּעַצְּרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6116><s%> in your solemn assemblies

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Even אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though תַּעֲלוּ־ <S%H5927><s%> Though ye offer לִ֥י עֹל֛וֹת <S%H5930><s%> me burnt offerings וּמִנְחֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4503><s%> and your meat offerings לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶרְצֶ֑ה <S%H7521><s%> I will not accept וְשֶׁ֥לֶם <S%H8002><s%> the peace offerings מְרִיאֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4806><s%> of your fat beasts לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and I אַבִּֽיט׃ <S%H5027><s%> [them] neither will I regard

הָסֵ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> Take thou away מֵעָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> from me the noise שִׁרֶ֑יךָ <S%H7892><s%> of thy songs וְזִמְרַ֥ת <S%H2172><s%> the melody נְבָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5035><s%> of thy viols לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> even אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> for I will not hear

וְיִגַּ֥ל <S%H1556><s%> run down כַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> as waters מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> But let judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness כְּנַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> stream אֵיתָֽן׃ <S%H386><s%> as a mighty

הַזְּבָחִ֨ים <S%H2077><s%> unto me sacrifices וּמִנְחָ֜ה <S%H4503><s%> and offerings הִֽגַּשְׁתֶּם־ <S%H5066><s%> Have ye offered לִ֧י בַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וּנְשָׂאתֶ֗ם <S%H5375><s%> But ye have borne אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> סִכּ֣וּת <S%H5522><s%> the tabernacle מַלְכְּכֶ֔ם <S%H4432><s%> Molech וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כִּיּ֣וּן <S%H3594><s%> and Chiun צַלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6754><s%> your images כּוֹכַב֙ <S%H3556><s%> the star אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> of your god אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> which ye made לָכֶֽם׃

וְהִגְלֵיתִ֥י <S%H1540><s%> Therefore will I cause you to go into captivity אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵהָ֣לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> beyond לְדַמָּ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> Damascus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> [is] The God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> whose name פ
